direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods deal with text content within the element, but 'hasText' checks for the presence of non-blank text while 'text' retrieves the combined text.
Both methods are concerned with text content, but 'ownText' retrieves the text directly owned by the element, while 'hasText' checks for the presence of non-blank text.
Both methods deal with content within the element, but 'data' retrieves the combined data of the element, while 'hasText' checks for the presence of non-blank text.
